649690.name: SMILE GAME BUILDER A Healer Only Lives Twice Character Resource Pack
649690.description:
A collaboration DLC with a remarkable game, "A Healer Only Lives Twice"!

This DLC contains a total of 95 models: original 48 unique and cute characters from "A Healer Only Lives Twice" (26 models + 22 color variations) and additional 45 color variations and also 2 main characters, a knight and a priest. The exact motions from the original game, "A Healer Only Lives Twice", were implemented to these models, so after purchasing it, you can create dynamic 3D battles and wonderful scenes right away.

This DLC includes a game file of an adventure game, "Iron Will"!

This DLC includes a game file, "Iron Will" made by Pon Pon Games, and the purchasers can see its techniques and also edit it to create fun fictions.


*This resource pack is royalty-free and available for commercial or non-commercial use only within games rendered using our products, or both using SMILE GAME BUILDER and Exporter for Unity to build to other consoles.


More information about the original game of "A Healer Only Lives Twice"
